tool.name: tool_16

param.name: DTM_1
param.dialogReference:
DTM 1

Grid, input, optional

optional

The first DTM used to assign height information to grid 1

param.name: DTM_2
param.dialogReference:
DTM 2

Grid, input, optional

optional

The second DTM used to assign height information to grid 2

param.name: CORRPOINTS
param.dialogReference:
Correlated Points

Shapes, output

Correlated points with displacement and correlation information

param.name: CORRLINES
param.dialogReference:
Displacement Vector

Shapes, output

Displacement vectors between correlated points

param.name: SEARCH_CHIPSIZE
param.dialogReference:
Search Chip Size (Cells)

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] 16x16

[1] 32x32

[2] 64x64

[3] 128x128

[4] 256x256

Default: 2

Chip size of search chip, used to find correlating reference chip

param.name: REF_CHIPSIZE
param.dialogReference:
Reference Chip Size (Cells)

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] 16x16

[1] 32x32

[2] 64x64

[3] 128x128

Default: 1

Chip size of reference chip to be found in search chip

param.name: GRID_SPACING
param.dialogReference:
Grid Spacing (Map Units)

Floating point

Minimum: 0.100000

Maximum: 256.000000

Default: 10.000000

Grid spacing used for the construction of correlated points [map units]

tool.summary: The tool performs an image correlation based on two raster data sets. Additionally, two DTMs can be given and used to optain 3D displacement vectors. This is a SAGA implementation of the standalone IMCORR software provided by the National Snow and Ice Data Center in Boulder, Colorado / US.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
